components.renderables

Class SplineComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Component
      • components.renderables.RenderableComponent<Spline>
        • components.renderables.SplineComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, Invalidatable

    public class SplineComponent
extends RenderableComponent<Spline>
    Contains a Spline what you van render or can be used as a path of an object.
